directions: Put tomatoes into a large serving bowl; season with salt and pepper and toss.
Beat buttermilk, sour cream, basil, shallot, and garlic together with a whisk in a separate bowl; season with salt and pepper. Drizzle dressing over tomatoes and toss to coat.
ingredients: 6 cups red and yellow cherry tomatoes, some halved
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Red and Yellow Cherry Tomato Salad
